actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: Resolution directing the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to furnish certain facts pertaining to small business investment companies.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to furnish to the House of Representatives specified facts pertaining to small business investment companies.

titles.title: Resolution directing the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to furnish certain facts pertaining to small business investment companies.
